TESTIMONIALS.TITLE: What our customers say
TESTIMONIALS.TESTIMONIAL_1: As a renter, I was looking for a trustworthy platform with affordable listings. This site made my search quick and hassle-free!
TESTIMONIALS.TESTIMONIAL_2: As a renter, I was looking for a trustworthy platform with affordable listings. This site made my search quick and hassle-free, and communication with landlords was seamless!
TESTIMONIALS.TESTIMONIAL_3: I listed my apartment here in minutes, and within a week, I found a serious tenant! Highly recommend this platform for both renting and listing properties.

APP_SECTION.TITLE: Stay Ahead with Our App
APP_SECTION.DESCRIPTION: Get instant alerts on new listings, exclusive deals, and real-time updates. Find your perfect rental or list your property anytime, anywhere – all at your fingertips!

TERMS.TITLE: Terms of Use
TERMS.WELCOME_PLATFORM: These Terms of Use ("Terms") govern your access to and use of the platform, including our website and mobile application (collectively referred to as the “Platform”).
TERMS.WELCOME_AGREEMENT: By using, you agree to comply with and be bound by these Terms.
TERMS.DESCRIPTION: is an online platform that connects property owners with potential tenants for rental purposes only. Users can list available properties for rent, search and filter listings, contact landlords via email or WhatsApp, interact with a chatbot for help, receive notifications, and leave reviews.
TERMS.USER_TYPES: There are two main types of users: property owners, who can list properties (subject to payment), and renters, who can browse and contact property owners. Users agree to provide accurate information, avoid illegal or abusive activities, and not publish misleading listings.
TERMS.FEES: may charge a fee for property listings, which will be communicated during the process and is generally non-refundable.
TERMS.FEES_RESPONSIBILITY: Users are responsible for the content they publish, and reserves the right to remove fraudulent or inappropriate listings.
TERMS.COMMUNICATION: Users may communicate through email, WhatsApp, or our chatbot.
TERMS.COMMUNICATION_DISCLAIMER: is not responsible for agreements made outside the platform or offline transactions.
TERMS.REVIEWS: The rating and review feature allows users to share experiences, but
TERMS.REVIEWS_PRIVACY: may moderate inappropriate feedback. All personal data is protected according to our Privacy Policy.
TERMS.INTELLECTUAL_PROPERTY: All content and technology used on is protected by intellectual property rights. Unauthorized use or distribution is prohibited.
TERMS.TERMINATION: We may suspend or terminate access to the platform in case of Terms violation.
TERMS.GOVERNING_LAW: These Terms are governed by the laws of the Arab Republic of Egypt. We may modify these Terms at any time with appropriate notice.
TERMS.CONTACT_INFO: For inquiries, please contact us at:
